text: Yara baleh amara nachara, ami tadera kacha theke'o tadera angikara niyechilama. Atahpara tara'o ye upadesa prapta hayechila, ta theke upakara labha kara bhule gela. Atahpara ami keyamata paryanta tadera madhye parasparika satruta o bidbesa sancarita kare diyechi. Abasese allaha taderake tadera krtakarma samparke abahita karabena.
